content: chain 2 skip 2 sts and then make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts then make 2 half_double_crochet into the hole you made from the previous row finally make 1 half_double_crochet in the last st 9 sts row 9 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 5 sts then make 2 half_double_crochet into the hole you made from the previous row make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts then in the last st make 2 half_double_crochet finally chain 3 12 sts row 10 chain 1 turn start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the 2 chs then make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 12 sts 14 sts *fasten_off link to video - https //youtu be/k6nhgajkcbw if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
